verbs.description: [ARG1: Retired Lt . Gen. Thomas McInerney] ( [V: retired] ) appeared to mock Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) during his guest appearance on Fox Business Network Thursday . Here 's what he said The former Air Force vice assistant chief of staff and former Fox Business analyst slid into his comments an insult against McCain that has been debunked by several news outlets . He was speaking to Fox News Business host Charles Payne about McCain 's decision to oppose Trump 's nominee , Gina Haspel , for the directorship of the CIA . " Senator John McCain , " Payne said . " he 's not going to endorse Haspel also in part because she believes in torture , that she thinks it works , even though she laid out at least three instances where it did work to the benefit of humankind , not just Americans , but all human beings . " " Should they be evaluating this nominee on her feelings , " he asked , " or based strictly on the facts and her commitment not to use …

He was speaking to Fox News Business host Charles Payne about McCain 's decision to oppose Trump 's nominee , Gina Haspel , for the directorship of the CIA . " Senator John McCain , " Payne said . " he 's not going to endorse Haspel also in part because she believes in torture , that she thinks it works , even though she laid out at least three instances where it did work to the benefit of humankind , not just Americans , but all human beings . " " Should they be evaluating this nominee on her feelings , " he asked , " or based strictly on the facts and her commitment not to use …
